text: @realDonaldTrump @RoyCooperNC @DanForestNC Yeah, that pesky coronavirus that you dropped like a stone.  We all know you freeze when you have to do real work.  Lucky for you Russia threw the 2016 election in your favor.  Of course you lost the popular vote to Hillary.
